name: Reactions Lite
description:
How fast are your reactions? How good are your reflexes? Find it out with the free lite version of "Reactions".

You have to meet different tasks shown on screen, for example: shake your iPhone or iPod, tilt it, snap fingers, freeze and others. Try to react to them as fast as you can.

"Reactions" uses the built in microphone to detect claps or snaps. Thus the clapping/snapping action is only available to iPhone but the game does also work on iPods.

The full version includes:

* More swipe and tilt actions
* Multiplayer mode
* Save your highscores
* Low introducing price
* More fun
